## EditLiveSearchComponent class

Component used for obtaining edit live search html element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EditLiveSearchComponent implements EditLiveSearch, NgSelectPluginGeneric<EditLiveSearchOptions>, OnDestroy 
```
